item.description:
Phantom Gourmet is organizing BBQ Beach Party.
Its an outside party where famous BBQ cooks come together.... so as long as u like outside there is nothing that you will not find ! This is the best BBQ event of the summer so dont miss it!

More details can be found at : http://bbq.phantomgou...

Tickets are just $5 online. ($10 at the event). Buy your tickets online today !

We plant to meet there at 1PM.

I will update the exact location soon.

How to get there:
1. Public T: Blue Line (they have a shuttle from the T-station to the event)
2. Car: They have parking lot (i dont know how much they charge for it).

Those who plan to drive and are ready to carpool please mention that in the comments.

Stay tuned for more details
item.name: BBQ at Suffolk Down
